name: JCC Teacher's Sumo Wrestling
description:
JCC  presents Teacher's Sumo Wrestling: The Game

Due to Covid-19 we weren't able to host the second teacher's sumo wrestling event last year, so instead we have launched AGSB's most popular event of 2019 as a game online.

It's free to play but a small donation to JCC would be much appreciated. All funds raised go to The Christie Charity. Thank you.
